summary: This bill, the Research Advancing to Market Production for Innovators Act, focuses on improving commercialization activities within the Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR) and Small Business Technology Transfer (STTR) programs. It modifies peer review processes to emphasize commercialization potential, improves phase flexibility for awards, mandates the designation of Technology Commercialization Officials within federal agencies, expands technical and business assistance available to recipients, and promotes participation in the I-Corps program. The bill also requires an annual commercialization impact assessment and directs the Administrator to establish a prioritized patent examination program for SBIR and STTR recipients.
